attributes.action: Review Police Guidlines and Stop all this Form Filling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is for all those Police officers who are sick and tired of all that "form filling" which takes so much time. Also, the Government need to review Police guidlines; we hear so much about, we can't do this because of this, and we can't do that because of that!! The Police and Legal Proffesion should respect their 'customers' rights but not to the detrement of their jobs.
